trans-unit.source: Provides a mechanism for programmatically building the constraints for a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en metode for å bygge programmatisk begrensningene for en tale recognition grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: Speech recognition grammars are commonly authored in the XML format defined by the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Tale recognition grammars er vanligvis redigert i XML-format som er definert av den [tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) versjon 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with SRGS but want to generate the grammars programmatically, you can use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace, whose members correspond closely to the elements and attributes defined by SRGS.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du er kjent med SRGS, men ønsker å generere grammars programmatisk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar>-navneområdet der medlemmer med nært elementer og attributter som er definert av SRGS.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar>

trans-unit.source: If you are unfamiliar with SRGS, or you want a lightweight, programmatic approach to authoring grammars with which you can efficiently accomplish many common scenarios; you can use the GrammarBuilder and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> classes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke kjenner SRGS, eller hvis du vil bruke en lett, programmatisk tilnærming til redigering grammars med. Du kan ta utføre mange vanlige scenarier; Du kan bruke GrammarBuilder og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>klasser.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>

trans-unit.source: Use GrammarBuilder objects to build a hierarchical tree composed of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects that contain alternate phrases, interspersed with preamble and post-amble phrases at each node, and seeded with semantic values that convey meaning back to the application.
trans-unit.target: Bruke GrammarBuilder objekter til å bygge en hierarkisk tre består av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>objekter som inneholder alternative uttrykk blandet med innledningen og etter amble uttrykk på hver node og seedet med semantisk verdier som betydning tilbake til programmet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>

trans-unit.source: To use a GrammarBuilder to create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object, use the following steps.
trans-unit.target: Bruke en GrammarBuilder til å opprette en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt, bruker du følgende fremgangsmåte.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Create a GrammarBuilder object.
trans-unit.target: Opprett et GrammarBuilder-objekt.

trans-unit.source: Append constraints to the GrammarBuilder, such as <xref:System.String> objects, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DictationGrammar>, and other GrammarBuilder objects that define the constraints for the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Legge til begrensninger GrammarBuilder, slik som <xref:System.String>objekter, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DictationGrammar>, og andre GrammarBuilder-objekter som definerer begrensninger for grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DictationGrammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructors to create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from the completed GrammarBuilder grammar.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>Konstruktører til å opprette en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet fra fullstendige GrammarBuilder grammatikk.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Authoring with GrammarBuilder is best suited to grammars that have a single rule containing lists, or perhaps lists of lists.
trans-unit.target: Redigering av med GrammarBuilder passer best til grammars som har en regel som inneholder lister eller kanskje lister med lister.

trans-unit.source: To programmatically build grammars that have multiple rules, or that need to make internal rule references, use the classes of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace.
trans-unit.target: For å programmatisk opprette grammars som har flere regler, eller som vil gjøre intern regelen refererer til, kan du bruke klasser av den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar>navneområde.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar>

trans-unit.source: Instances of GrammarBuilder can also be obtained by implicit conversions from certain other classes or by combining a GrammarBuilder with a second object that contains constraints for a grammar..
trans-unit.target: Forekomster av GrammarBuilder kan også hentes implisitt konvertering fra enkelte andre klasser eller ved å kombinere et GrammarBuilder med et annet objekt som inneholder begrensninger for en grammatikk..

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A> operators and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A>operatorer og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Implicit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add rules to an existing GrammarBuilder, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til regler i en eksisterende GrammarBuilder, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Tale gjenkjenner kan Iverksett et unntak ved bruk av en tale recognition grammatikk som inneholder dupliserte semantisk elementer med samme nøkkel navn eller flere semantiske elementer som gjentatte ganger å endre verdien av det samme semantiske elementet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du bygger en tale recognition grammatikk som inneholder semantisk informasjon, se [ved hjelp av SemanticResultKey og SemanticResultValue objekter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).

trans-unit.source: To help with debugging, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.DebugShowPhrases%2A> property returns the current status of the GrammarBuilder as a string.
trans-unit.target: Til hjelp med feilsøking, den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.DebugShowPhrases%2A>egenskapen returnerer gjeldende status for GrammarBuilder som en streng.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.DebugShowPhrases%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about building and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om oppretting og bruke tale recognition grammars [talegjenkjenning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) og [oppretter GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny, tom forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: To add rules to an existing <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A> methods, and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: Du legger til regler på et eksisterende <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekt, bruker du den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A>metoder, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A>operatoren.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.op_Addition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendWildcard%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendDictation%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Add%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The speech recognizer can throw an exception when using a speech recognition grammar that contains duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the value of the same semantic element.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Tale gjenkjenner kan Iverksett et unntak ved bruk av en tale recognition grammatikk som inneholder dupliserte semantisk elementer med samme nøkkel navn eller flere semantiske elementer som gjentatte ganger å endre verdien av det samme semantiske elementet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du bygger en tale recognition grammatikk som inneholder semantisk informasjon, se [ved hjelp av SemanticResultKey og SemanticResultValue objekter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> class from a set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> klassen fra et sett med alternativer.

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains alternatives, see [Using Choices to Create a GrammarBuilder Grammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5b18db18-a5f6-46a3-aa77-6d3141544efd).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bygger en tale recognition grammatikk som inneholder alternativer [ved hjelp av alternativer for å opprette en GrammarBuilder grammatikk](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5b18db18-a5f6-46a3-aa77-6d3141544efd).

trans-unit.source: The set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Sett med alternativer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> class from a semantic key.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> klassen fra en semantisk nøkkel.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> object, you add semantic information to the grammar that can be returned in the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>serverforekomsten fra en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>objekt du legger til semantisk informasjon grammatikk som kan returneres i resultatet recognition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: You can access the semantic information in the recognition result using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>, which is available in the handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til semantisk informasjonen i å bruke recognition resultatet av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>, som er tilgjengelig i et behandlingsprogram for den `SpeechRecognized` hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> defines a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, this can be used to retrieve the semantic information in a recognition result that is associated with the key.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>definerer en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, dette kan brukes til å hente semantisk informasjonen i et recognition resultat som er forbundet med nøkkel.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: See the example for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>, and also see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>.
trans-unit.target: Se eksempel for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>, og også se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When you construct <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Når du konstruere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter som inneholder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>forekomster, kontroller at du unngå å opprette dupliserte semantisk elementer med samme nøkkel navn eller flere semantiske elementer gjentatte ganger kan endre den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>for en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer can throw an exception if it encounters these circumstances.
trans-unit.target: Dikterings-gjenkjenner kan Iverksett et unntak hvis det oppstår slike tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du bygger en tale recognition grammatikk som inneholder semantisk informasjon, se [ved hjelp av SemanticResultKey og SemanticResultValue objekter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).

trans-unit.source: The semantic key.
trans-unit.target: Semantiske nøkkelen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> class from a semantic value.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> klassen fra en semantisk verdi.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> object, you add semantic information to the grammar that can be returned in the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>serverforekomsten fra en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>objekt du legger til semantisk informasjon grammatikk som kan returneres i resultatet recognition.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: You can access the semantic information in the recognition result using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>, which is available in the handler for the `SpeechRecognized` event.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til semantisk informasjonen i å bruke recognition resultatet av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>, som er tilgjengelig i et behandlingsprogram for den `SpeechRecognized` hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase.Semantics%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> defines a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, this can be used to retrieve the semantic information in a recognition result that is associated with the key.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>definerer en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>, dette kan brukes til å hente semantisk informasjonen i et recognition resultat som er forbundet med nøkkel.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: See the example for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>, and also see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>.
trans-unit.target: Se eksempel for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>, og også se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.Append%28System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey%29>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When you construct <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Når du konstruere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter som inneholder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>forekomster, kontroller at du unngå å opprette dupliserte semantisk elementer med samme nøkkel navn eller flere semantiske elementer gjentatte ganger kan endre den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>for en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.target: Dikterings-gjenkjenner kan Iverksett et unntak hvis det oppstår slike tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains semantic information, see [Using SemanticResultKey and SemanticResultValue Objects](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om hvordan du bygger en tale recognition grammatikk som inneholder semantisk informasjon, se [ved hjelp av SemanticResultKey og SemanticResultValue objekter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0fea1236-5261-4608-89b3-9ce9ffc22a1c).

trans-unit.source: The semantic value or name/value pair.
trans-unit.target: Semantiske verdi eller navn/verdi-paret.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> class from a sequence of words.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> klassen fra en sekvens ord..

trans-unit.source: The phrase represents an exact spoken phrase that the speech recognition grammar can recognize.
trans-unit.target: Uttrykket representerer et nøyaktig uttrykk sier tale recognition grammatikk kan gjenkjenne.

trans-unit.source: For more information about building a speech recognition grammar that contains strings, see [Using Strings to Create a GrammarBuilder Grammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0d87b445-a342-4369-9b3f-91d07fd7e114).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du bygger en tale recognition grammatikk som inneholder strenger [ved hjelp av strenger for å opprette en GrammarBuilder grammatikk](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0d87b445-a342-4369-9b3f-91d07fd7e114).

trans-unit.source: The sequence of words.
trans-unit.target: Sekvens ord..

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> class for a subset of a sequence of words.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> klasse for et delsett av en rekke ord.

trans-unit.source: The `phrase` parameter represents the phrase that the speech recognition grammar can recognize.
trans-unit.target: Den `phrase` parameteren representerer uttrykket tale recognition grammatikk kan gjenkjenne.

trans-unit.source: The `subsetMatchingMode` parameter specifies a subset of the phrase that can be spoken to achieve successful recognition of the entire phrase.
trans-unit.target: Den `subsetMatchingMode` parameteren angir et delsett av uttrykk som kan talte for å oppnå vellykket gjenkjenning av hele dette uttrykket.

trans-unit.source: You can use this to create a grammar with a list of entries that have long names, without requiring users to speak an entire name to match an item.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke dette til å opprette en grammatikk med en liste med oppføringer som har lange navn uten å kreve at brukere snakke en hele navnet som samsvarer med et element.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the matching modes, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om samsvarende modus, kan du se <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SubsetMatchingMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> class from a repeated element.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> klassen fra en gjentatte elementet.

trans-unit.source: If the value of `minRepeat` is 0, then the new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> represents an optional element.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for `minRepeat` er 0, blir den nye <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>representerer et valgfritt element.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The value of `minRepeat` must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to the value of `maxRepeat`.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for `minRepeat` må være større enn eller lik 0 og mindre enn eller lik verdien for `maxRepeat`.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When you specify repeats for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Når du angir gjentas for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter som inneholder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>forekomster, kontroller at du unngå å opprette dupliserte semantisk elementer med samme nøkkel navn eller flere semantiske elementer gjentatte ganger kan endre den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>for en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> that contains a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"></xref> object followed by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When you combine <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.

trans-unit.source: Appends the default dictation grammar to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: Føyer til standard diktering grammatikk i den gjeldende sekvensen grammatikk elementer.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified dictation grammar to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: Tilføyer grammatikk angitte diktering i gjeldende sekvensen grammatikk elementer.

trans-unit.source: To use the spelling dictation grammar, set `category` to `spelling`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke stavemåten diktering grammatikk, kan du angi `category` til `spelling`.

trans-unit.source: For more information on dictation grammars, see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.DictationGrammar>.

trans-unit.source: The category of the dictation grammar to append.
trans-unit.target: Kategori for diktering grammatikk skal tilføyes.

trans-unit.source: Appends a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: Tilføyer en grammatikk definisjonsfilen til den gjeldende sekvensen grammatikk elementer.

trans-unit.source: The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som er angitt av det `path` argumentet kan være lokal eller ekstern.

trans-unit.source: The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må ha lesetilgang til plasseringen av angitte grammatikk filer.

trans-unit.source: A W3C Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) representation can define a root rule.
trans-unit.target: W3C tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) representere kan definere en rot-regel.

trans-unit.source: This method appends the grammar, beginning with its root rule, to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilføyer grammatikk begynner med den primære regelen, i gjeldende sekvensen grammatikk elementer.

trans-unit.source: To append a specific grammar rule, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil tilføye en regel for bestemte grammatikk, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.
trans-unit.target: Banen eller Universal URI (Resource Identifier) for filen som beskriver en tale recognition grammatikk i et format som støttes.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified rule of a grammar definition file to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: Føyer til den angitte regelen for en grammatikk definisjonsfilen i den gjeldende sekvensen grammatikk elementer.

trans-unit.source: The URI provided by the `path` argument may be local or remote.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som er angitt av det `path` argumentet kan være lokal eller ekstern.

trans-unit.source: The application must have read access to the location of specified grammar files.
trans-unit.target: Programmet må ha lesetilgang til plasseringen av angitte grammatikk filer.

trans-unit.source: You can use the use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A> method to append a grammar file beginning with its root rule.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke bruken av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>metode for å tilføye en grammatikk filen som begynner med den primære regelen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.AppendRuleReference%2A>

trans-unit.source: The file path or Universal Resource Identifier (URI) of the file that describes a speech recognition grammar in a supported format.
trans-unit.target: Filbanen eller Universal URI (Resource Identifier) for filen som beskriver en tale recognition grammatikk i et format som støttes.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to append, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to append the default root rule of the grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Identifikatoren for regel for å tilføye, eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> å tilføye standard roten regelen av grammatikkfilen.

trans-unit.source: Appends a recognition grammar element that matches any input to the current sequence of grammar elements.
trans-unit.target: Tilføyer en recognition grammatikk element som samsvarer med inndata i gjeldende sekvensen grammatikk elementer.

trans-unit.source: The wildcard element is added to the end of the current sequence of elements.
trans-unit.target: Jokertegnelementet legges til slutten av gjeldende rekkefølgen av elementer.

trans-unit.source: The wildcard element matches any spoken word.
trans-unit.target: Jokertegnelementet samsvarer med noen sier word.

trans-unit.source: It does not match background noise or silence.
trans-unit.target: Det samsvarer ikke med bakgrunnsstøy eller stillhet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture of the speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kulturen av tale recognition grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructor creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that can be used by a speech recognizer of the corresponding culture.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objekt som kan brukes av en tale gjenkjenner på den tilsvarende kulturen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Only the Culture property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> that is provided as the parameter to the Grammar constructor is used to set the culture of the resulting speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Bare kultur-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>som er angitt i parameteren grammatikk-konstruktøren brukes til å angi kulturen av den resulterende tale recognition grammatikken.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows og System.Speech API godta alle gyldige språket land-koder.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the `Culture` property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Til å utføre talegjenkjenning på språket som er angitt i den `Culture` egenskapen, en motor for talegjenkjenning som støtter språket landskoden må være installert.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Talegjenkjenningsmotorer som fulgte med Microsoft Windows 7 fungerer med følgende koder for språket land.

trans-unit.source: - en-GB.
trans-unit.target: -en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom) - en-US.
trans-unit.target: Engelsk (Storbritannia) - en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States) - de-DE.
trans-unit.target: Engelsk (USA) - Tyskland Tyskland.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany) - es-ES.
trans-unit.target: Tysk (Tyskland) - es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain) - fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: Spansk (Spain) - Fransk-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France) - ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: Fransk (Frankrike) - Japan.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan) - zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: Japansk - zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China) - zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Kina) - zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan) Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Kinesisk (Taiwan) to-bokstav språkkoder for eksempel "no", "no" eller "a" er også tillatt.

trans-unit.source: The culture of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kulturen av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is the executing thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture*> property.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er kjøres trådens <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that shows the contents and structure of the grammar contained by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som viser innholdet og strukturen i grammatikk som inneholder den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current content and structure of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> that contains a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"></xref> object followed by a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When you combine <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects that contain <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> instances, make sure you avoid creating duplicate semantic elements with the same key name or multiple semantic elements that could repeatedly modify the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> object.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Når du kombinere <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objekter som inneholder <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>forekomster, kontroller at du unngå å opprette dupliserte semantisk elementer med samme nøkkel navn eller flere semantiske elementer gjentatte ganger kan endre den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A>for en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticValue.Value%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>
